page.title: 13A SWIMMING LESSON
page.content: At 10.15am we set off for swimming.I sat next to Helen. Claire and Katie were behind us. They kept sticking their heads through the gaps to talk to us. Katie's got such a big head that she got it stuck! We eventually got to the pool. Mr Hardey said "Driver's side first". I was door side so we had to wait a few seconds before getting out of the coach. We rushed into the changing rooms to get ghanged. The footbath was freezing so I walked slowly through it but Emma came up and splashed me. Our lesson was taken by Mr Hardey and we concentrated on breaststroke. Matthew jumped in at the wrong moment and Mr Hardey's spotless trainers got wet. Mrs Robinson blew her whistle and we all climbed out. Stephen nearly went into the wrong changing room but Mrs Robinson reminded him luckily.
